__e: Okay, listen, I'm just floating this, but have you ever thought that it might be a good thing Marge dumped you?
HAVE YOU EVER, AT THE SAME TIME, UTTERED THE SAME THOUGHT AS YOUR HUSBAND?
I'm sorry, but have you ever stopped to think that maybe the problem isn't with me, but with you?
HAVE YOU EVER, AT THE SAME TIME, UTTERED THE SAME THOUGHT AS YOUR HUSBAND?
And... I knew it wasn't the right way to go, but... haven't you ever wanted to be something more than you are?
I'm sorry, but have you ever stopped to think that maybe the problem isn't with me, but with you?
You said they're better employees than us..
Didn't you say you had something to ask me?
Didn't you say you spoke to a friend about coming here?
And why didn't you call the police?
- Well, when you saw that she wasn't really holding up her end of the conversation, why didn't you call the police?
Why didn't you call the police when you first discovered the window?
Yeah,but haven't you pretty much figured out that he doesn't?
When you were a child, didn't you have a mother and a father, and a house and a street in a town?
Look, I know you've had some problems in the past, but maybe you haven't had the right person help you...
Is there no respect of place, persons, nor time in you?
Don't you want your child to see the light of day?
Do you have any idea how difficult it is to make a living doing something like that?
Colonel, why didn't you tell the President how badly the rescue was going when he called?
Why didn't you tell us this when you showed us the house?
Have you nothing to say to me? - Yes.
Is there anything you want me to know?
Have you nothing to say to your true love now?
Why didn't you tell us this when you showed us the house?
Why do you waste your time. Haven't you anything better to do?
Doctor, is there no way you can get into your ship?
Do you have any memories of being ushered from your chambers in the middle of the night?
Why are you okay with that?
